subject: Cycling, Track
Olympic Games (2012)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Muscles
lead_paragraph: Everything about track cycling emphasizes the sleek and the slim – except the extraordinarily thick thighs, sometimes frighteningly so, of the sprinters.
